attributes.action: Give more compensation to the injured orkilled servicemen and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a petition to bring the point that our goverment the exact people who send british soldiers to war to die for there country dont take care of the injured soldiers or there families through the hard times that they have to endure when money can be hard to come across. This is a petition to try and get more money for these great heroes who fight to keep war out of britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
